projects.name: Surf's Up: The Final Break
projects.creative_prompt:
{
  "CONCEPT & VISION": {
    "Logline": "Five surfers of varying generations face escalating waves in a high-stakes California contest until only one master remains to conquer the final break.",
    "Visual Style": "Vibrant",
    "Emotional Arc": "Competitive Optimism \u2192 Rising Tension \u2192 Triumphant Solitude",
    "Narrative Structure": "Linear"
  },
  "CHARACTERS": [
    {
      "Name": "The Rookie",
      "Age": "19 years old",
      "Physical Build": "Lean, wiry frame, average height",
      "Face": "Round jaw, wide eyes, tanned skin with zinc oxide on nose",
      "Hair": "Bleached blond, short, messy texture",
      "Clothing": "Neon green and black wetsuit top, black boardshorts",
      "Accessories": "Yellow surfboard leash, waterproof sport watch",
      "Emotional State": "Over-eager and jittery",
      "Character Arc": "Starts with explosive energy but falters due to lack of experience.",
      "Key Actions": [
        "Paddles furiously toward the first wave",
        "Attempts a sharp turn too early",
        "Loses balance and splashes into the water"
      ]
    },
    {
      "Name": "The Stylist",
      "Age": "24 years old",
      "Physical Build": "Tall, slender, graceful posture",
      "Face": "High cheekbones, sharp nose, olive skin",
      "Hair": "Dark brown, waist-length, wet and slicked back",
      "Clothing": "Vintage-style floral long-sleeve rash guard, navy bikini bottoms",
      "Accessories": "Single turquoise stud earring, white longboard",
      "Emotional State": "Calm and focused",
      "Character Arc": "Maintains composure until a rogue wave disrupts their flow.",
      "Key Actions": [
        "Walks to the nose of the board",
        "Glides across the face of a wave",
        "Slips sideways as the wave crest breaks unexpectedly"
      ]
    },
    {
      "Name": "The Powerhouse",
      "Age": "32 years old",
      "Physical Build": "Broad shoulders, muscular chest, heavy build",
      "Face": "Square jaw, stubble beard, deep tan",
      "Hair": "Shaved head",
      "Clothing": "Red boardshorts, no shirt",
      "Accessories": "Black surfboard leash, large waterproof fitness tracker",
      "Emotional State": "Aggressive and determined",
      "Character Arc": "Dominates with brute strength until overpowered by nature.",
      "Key Actions": [
        "Carves a deep gouge into the water with a sharp turn",
        "Smashes the lip of the wave aggressively",
        "Gets knocked off board by heavy whitewash"
      ]
    },
    {
      "Name": "The Veteran",
      "Age": "55 years old",
      "Physical Build": "Sinewy, weathered, medium height",
      "Face": "Deep wrinkles around eyes, leather-like skin texture",
      "Hair": "Salt and pepper gray, short buzz cut",
      "Clothing": "Faded black full-body wetsuit",
      "Accessories": "Classic yellow surfboard",
      "Emotional State": "Stoic and calculating",
      "Character Arc": "Relies on wisdom but physically tires in the final heat.",
      "Key Actions": [
        "Reads the ocean horizon intently",
        "Executes a smooth bottom turn",
        "Bails out safely as a wave closes out"
      ]
    },
    {
      "Name": "The Champion",
      "Age": "28 years old",
      "Physical Build": "Athletic, toned, flexible",
      "Face": "Focused gaze, angular features, sun-kissed skin",
      "Hair": "Light brown, shoulder-length, tied in a loose bun",
      "Clothing": "Blue and white geometric patterned wetsuit top, matching shorts",
      "Accessories": "White high-performance shortboard",
      "Emotional State": "In the zone, purely reactive",
      "Character Arc": "Transforms from one of the pack to the solitary master of the element.",
      "Key Actions": [
        "Paddles with rhythmic precision",
        "Drops vertically down a massive wave face",
        "Disappears into and emerges from a heavy water barrel"
      ]
    },
    {
      "Name": "The Announcers",
      "Age": "45-50 years old",
      "Physical Build": "Average builds, seated posture",
      "Face": "Expressive, laughing, wearing polarized sunglasses",
      "Hair": "One bald, one with short dark hair",
      "Clothing": "Matching white polo shirts with contest logos",
      "Accessories": "Large broadcast headsets, microphones, clipboards",
      "Emotional State": "Excited and animated",
      "Character Arc": "Observers reflecting the rising stakes of the event.",
      "Key Actions": [
        "Point excitedly at the ocean",
        "Speak rapidly into microphones",
        "Throw hands up in disbelief"
      ]
    }
  ],
  "LOCATIONS": [
    {
      "Name": "Pacific Shores Contest Zone",
      "Type": "Beach",
      "Time of Day": "2:00 PM full sun",
      "Weather": "Clear blue skies, high visibility, windy",
      "Key Visual Elements": [
        "Wooden judging tower",
        "Bright orange contest buoys in water",
        "Crowd barriers on sand",
        "Crashing turquoise waves",
        "White sea foam",
        "Spectators with umbrellas",
        "Golden sand"
      ],
      "Atmosphere": "Bustling, high-energy, loud",
      "Color Palette": [
        "Turquoise Blue",
        "Golden Sand",
        "Bright Orange",
        "White Foam",
        "Sky Blue"
      ]
    }
  ],
  "SCENE BEAT STRUCTURE": [
    {
      "Scene ID": "1",
      "Timing": "00:00-00:08 (8s)",
      "Musical Context": "Upbeat intro, establishing energy",
      "Action": "A wide shot of the beach shows all five contestants standing in a line at the water's edge holding their boards. They run simultaneously into the surf as the crowd behind the barriers cheers and waves.",
      "Character Positions": "Contestants in center foreground line, crowd in background",
      "Emotional Beat": "Anticipation and competitive spirit",
      "Transition to Next": "Smooth cut to water action"
    },
    {
      "Scene ID": "2",
      "Timing": "00:08-00:14 (6s)",
      "Musical Context": "Fast-paced rhythm",
      "Action": "The Rookie catches a medium wave but leans too far forward. The nose of the board digs into the water, sending the Rookie flipping awkwardly over the front into the splash.",
      "Character Positions": "The Rookie center frame, wave breaking behind",
      "Emotional Beat": "First failure, reality check",
      "Transition to Next": "Quick cut to reaction"
    },
    {
      "Scene ID": "3",
      "Timing": "00:14-00:18 (4s)",
      "Musical Context": "Brief impact hit",
      "Action": "A close-up of the Announcers in the tower grabbing their heads in sympathy. One announcer points at the water while speaking into the headset microphone.",
      "Character Positions": "Announcers centered, ocean visible through window behind",
      "Emotional Beat": "Shared disappointment",
      "Transition to Next": "Cut back to water"
    },
    {
      "Scene ID": "4",
      "Timing": "00:18-00:24 (6s)",
      "Musical Context": "Flowing melody",
      "Action": "The Stylist cross-steps gracefully to the nose of the longboard on a glassy wave. Suddenly the wave wall crumbles, knocking The Stylist sideways off the board into the whitewater.",
      "Character Positions": "Stylist moves right to left, falls center",
      "Emotional Beat": "Loss of grace, escalating difficulty",
      "Transition to Next": "Sudden cut to next surfer"
    },
    {
      "Scene ID": "5",
      "Timing": "00:24-00:30 (6s)",
      "Musical Context": "Heavy percussion",
      "Action": "The Powerhouse slashes a massive spray of water on a top turn. On the landing, the board wobbles violently, throwing The Powerhouse backward into the churning foam.",
      "Character Positions": "Powerhouse center, spray fills upper frame",
      "Emotional Beat": "Strength failing against nature",
      "Transition to Next": "Hard cut"
    },
    {
      "Scene ID": "6",
      "Timing": "00:30-00:36 (6s)",
      "Musical Context": "Tension building",
      "Action": "The Veteran drops down a steep wave face but realizes it is closing out. The Veteran intentionally dives off the side of the board just before the wave crashes down on the empty board.",
      "Character Positions": "Veteran small in frame against large wall of water",
      "Emotional Beat": "Tactical retreat, only one remains",
      "Transition to Next": "Buildup to silence/climax"
    },
    {
      "Scene ID": "7",
      "Timing": "00:36-00:44 (8s)",
      "Musical Context": "Bridge section - Grand, expansive, slow-motion feel",
      "Action": "The Champion drops into a colossal wave and tucks into a crouching position. The water curls over to form a massive tube, completely framing The Champion in a tunnel of blue water as they hold a perfect line.",
      "Character Positions": "Champion center, surrounded by water tunnel",
      "Emotional Beat": "Pure focus, mastery, triumph",
      "Transition to Next": "Smooth release"
    },
    {
      "Scene ID": "8",
      "Timing": "00:44-00:48 (4s)",
      "Musical Context": "High energy finale",
      "Action": "The Champion shoots out of the barrel into the sunlight, raising one fist in the air. In the background on the beach, the crowd jumps up and down in celebration.",
      "Character Positions": "Champion foreground right, beach background left",
      "Emotional Beat": "Victory and relief",
      "Transition to Next": "Fade out"
    }
  ]
}

data.enhancedPrompt: "A static, very wide establishing shot captured from eye level at Pacific Cove Beach, gazing out from the golden sand dunes toward the ocean. The time is 2:00 PM, and the bright afternoon sun is positioned behind the water (backlit 135-180°), creating a dramatic contre-jour effect where shadows fall forward toward the camera. A heavy, luminous mist hangs over the turquoise water, softening the high-intensity sunlight into visible rays that cut through the atmospheric haze. The beach is completely desolate and empty of any people, characters, or signs of recent human activity. There are no people visible anywhere, not on the beach, not in the water, and not on any distant structures. There should be NO shadows cast from any person or character into the frame. To the side, a white judges tent, crowd barriers, and a distant wooden pier stand empty, reinforcing the mysterious, low-intensity mood. The composition emphasizes vast negative space with a center-weighted horizon, capturing the contrast between the static dunes and the energetic, wind-blown ocean surface."

refinedRules: [GLOBAL_IDENTITY] STRICT IDENTITY LOCK: Character facial features, bone structure, and body proportions must strictly match reference embeddings. 28-year-old male = masculine features. NO gender swapping. NO age drifting. Reference images are GROUND TRUTH, not suggestions.

[CRITICAL_COUNTING] QUANTITY ENFORCEMENT: Character counts are binary requirements. If '5 characters' are prompted, exactly 5 distinct entities must be visible. 4 is a CRITICAL FAILURE. 6 is a CRITICAL FAILURE. Crowds must be separated from named characters.

[TEMPORAL_CONTINUITY] STATE PERSISTENCE: Material states (Wet, Dirty, Torn, Injured) are IMMUTABLE unless a specific 'Cleaning/Healing' event occurs. If Frame 1 is wet, Frame 100 MUST be wet. Drying requires a time-lapse transition.

[CAMERA_VECTOR] VECTOR LOGIC: Camera directions are absolute relative to the lens. 'Toward Camera' = Object scale increasing, distance decreasing. 'Away from Camera' = Object scale decreasing, distance increasing. NEGATIVE CONSTRAINT: [Lateral movement when depth movement is requested].

[ENVIRONMENT_MANDATE] LAYER COMPOSITION: Specified background layers (mountains, crowds) are REQUIRED to establish scale and parallax. However, Character Consistency takes priority over Background Detail in low-bitrate situations.

[DOMAIN_SEMANTICS_SURFING] TOKEN OVERRIDE 'BARREL' / 'GREEN ROOM': The interior space of a large, hollow, breaking wave. The 'walls' and 'ceiling' are made of translucent, moving liquid water. Light should filter through the water, creating a 'green room' effect. The surfer rides on the wave face inside this water tunnel. NEGATIVE CONSTRAINT: [No wooden barrels, no concrete pipes, no solid tunnels, no dry interiors, no green-painted rooms, the surfer is not fully submerged but inside a moving air pocket].

[PHYSICS_ENGINE] WAVE STATE DYNAMICS: A 'swell' is a rolling hill of water with no broken white water. A 'breaking wave' has a defined 'lip' (the curling top edge) that pitches forward, creating white 'foam' and 'spray' upon impact. 'Whitewash' is the turbulent, aerated water left after a wave breaks. NEGATIVE CONSTRAINT: [No static, solid, opaque blue shapes. Waves are not triangular blocks. The ocean surface is not a flat plane].

[BIOMECHANICS] ACTION 'WIPEOUT' / 'CRASH': A violent, uncontrolled loss of balance resulting in the surfer being forcefully submerged or thrown by the wave's energy. Involves separation from the surfboard and collision with turbulent water. The body should appear ragdoll-like or in a defensive posture, not stiff. NEGATIVE CONSTRAINT: [No gentle falls as if onto a soft surface, no floating peacefully away from the board, the surfer does not remain standing on the board as it goes underwater].

[CHARACTER_STYLE] DISTINCT RIDING STYLES: 'Cross-stepping' (Marcus) is a graceful walking motion along the length of a longboard. 'Aerial' (Leo) is a maneuver where the surfer and board launch into the air off the wave's lip and then land back on the wave. 'Carving' (Jax) involves leaning hard on the board's rail to make a deep, powerful turn, displacing a significant amount of water and creating a large spray. NEGATIVE CONSTRAINT: [Riding styles are not interchangeable. 'Cross-stepping' is not shuffling feet. 'Aerial' is not a simple jump; it requires leaving the water surface. 'Carving' is not a gentle, wide turn].

[EQUIPMENT_HANDLING] BOARD & LEASH PHYSICS: The surfboard must displace water, creating a 'wake' behind it when moving. Sharp turns create a 'fan of spray'. The 'leash' is a physical cord that tethers the surfer's ankle to the tail of the surfboard; it should be visible and taut when they are separated by water. NEGATIVE CONSTRAINT: [Boards do not glide without disturbing the water surface. Leashes are not invisible or purely decorative; they physically connect rider and board. Hands do not clip through the board when waxing or paddling].

[BIOMECHANICS] PADDLING DYNAMICS: The surfer is in a prone position (lying face-down) on the board. The action consists of alternating arm strokes that dig into the water to create forward propulsion. Back, shoulder, and arm muscles must show flexion and tension. NEGATIVE CONSTRAINT: [No sitting up and paddling like in a kayak, no effortless gliding without arm movement, no rigid body posture].

[VFX_STYLE] GLITCH MONTAGE: An intentional, stylized editing effect. Rapidly intersperse clear, high-energy action shots with flash-frames of white 'static', digital 'fragmentation' (pixelation/blocking), and bright 'solar flares'. The effect should feel rhythmic and chaotic, not like a corrupted video file. NEGATIVE CONSTRAINT: [Not a simple fast-cut montage, not a low-resolution video, not a random assortment of video errors].

[VFX_STYLE] LIGHTING 'HALO EFFECT' / 'BACKLIT': When the sun is low and directly behind a subject, it creates a brilliant, bright rim of light around their silhouette. This can cause a lens flare effect. The light source is the sun. NEGATIVE CONSTRAINT: [Not a literal, solid, golden ring floating over a character's head like an angel's halo. The effect is a property of light and camera interaction, not an object].

[DOMAIN_SEMANTICS_SURFING] ACTION 'DROP IN': The moment a surfer commits to a wave. It is the transition from paddling horizontally to turning down the 'face' of the wave to begin riding. This involves a 'pop-up' motion from a prone to a standing position while descending the steep wave face. NEGATIVE CONSTRAINT: [Not magically appearing on a wave already standing, not sliding down the wave on one's stomach, not a slow or hesitant transition].

For any shot specified as 'empty', 'untouched', or 'desolate', the shadow of the camera, tripod, or any implied observer must not be visible in the frame, especially in backlit (contre-jour) conditions.

scenes.composition: Center weighted horizon, vast negative space
scenes.description: Establish the setting of Pacific Cove Beach. The camera gazes out from the dunes toward the ocean, where the mist hangs heavy over the water. The beach is empty of people, focusing solely on the raw power of the incoming swell. The sun is high, casting a haze over the scene.

scenes.enhancedPrompt: "A static, very wide establishing shot captured from eye level at Pacific Cove Beach, gazing out from the golden sand dunes toward the ocean. The time is 2:00 PM, and the bright afternoon sun is positioned behind the water (backlit 135-180°), creating a dramatic contre-jour effect where shadows fall forward toward the camera. A heavy, luminous mist hangs over the turquoise water, softening the high-intensity sunlight into visible rays that cut through the atmospheric haze. The beach is completely desolate and empty of any people, characters, or signs of recent human activity. There are no people visible anywhere, not on the beach, not in the water, and not on any distant structures. There should be NO shadows cast from any person or character into the frame. The foreground sand must be completely clear of any object or shadow not belonging to the natural environment. --no human shadows, --no shadows in foreground. The focus is solely on the raw, untouched nature of the ocean and the crashing waves, which form dynamic silhouettes against the glare. To the side, a white judges tent, crowd barriers, and a distant wooden pier stand empty, reinforcing the mysterious, low-intensity mood. The composition emphasizes vast negative space with a center-weighted horizon, capturing the contrast between the static dunes and the energetic, wind-blown ocean surface."
